content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_STTMSActivityDetail') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STTMSActivityDetail
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STTMSActivityDetail (
[tms_activity_tripid] bigint,
[tms_activity_tripdriverid] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_tripdrivername] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_tripvehicleid] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_tripvehiclefleetcode] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_triptrailer1id] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_triptrailer1fleetcode] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_triptrailer2id] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_triptrailer2fleetcode] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_triptrailersize] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_tripstatus] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_tripparenetrouteid] bigint,
[tms_activity_tripparentroute] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_tripopsrouteid] bigint,
[tms_activity_tripopsroute] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_tripdispatchdate] date,
[tms_activity_triptransporter] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_tripsource] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_bookingid] bigint,
[tms_activity_bookingtype] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_bookingtrailersize] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_activity_bookingcubicvolume] float,
[tms_activity_directbooking] int,
[tms_activity_localbooking] int,
[tms_activity_bookingsource] nvarchar(4000),




)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/FINANCE/sttmsactivitydetail.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	);

GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.T_STTMSActivityDetail 
GO
